about_the_game:
Enter the dark and twisted world of "Swine's Revenge," a first-person horror game that will test your nerves and wits. Play as a determined police officer investigating a series of mysterious disappearances around a secluded farm. What starts as a routine case quickly descends into a nightmare as you uncover sinister secrets lurking in the shadows.


Key Features:

  • Gripping Storyline: Unravel the horrifying mystery as you navigate through sinister environments. With no knowledge of the serial killer’s identity, you must rely on your wits and instincts to survive. Each clue you find brings you closer to the truth, but also deeper into danger.
  • Immersive First-Person Gameplay: Engage in an intense, immersive experience with realistic environments and atmospheric sound design. Every shadow, every whisper, and every creak will keep you on edge. The game's detailed graphics and eerie audio will make you feel as though you are truly trapped in this nightmarish world.
  • Psychological Horror: Experience the torment of being trapped in your own mind. As you struggle to maintain your sanity, uncover the chilling truth about your nightmares and the horrifying reality of your situation. The game delves into the psychological aspects of fear, making you question what is real and what is imagined.

    Prepare yourself for a journey into fear and madness with Swine's Revenge. Can you retain your sanity and escape the clutches of a relentless evil, or will you be forever lost in the twisted world of Swine's Revenge?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain material that is not suitable for all ages or appropriate for viewing in the workplace, including frequent violence, gore, mature themes, and nudity. Viewer discretion is advised.
